alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 9:39PM EDT until March 15 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from near Rivervale to near Williams. White River from near Elliston to near Hazleton. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers due to rainfall last weekend. Minor flooding is occurring, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The crest of the East Fork White River is nearing Williams. The crest of the White River is at Edwardsport. The crest of the Wabash River is nearing Riverton. Flooding will gradually end during the coming week at many sites, but may last into early next weekend along the far lower reaches of the Wabash and White Rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Williams. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Campground begins to flood at Williams Dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Monday evening and continue falling to 2.6 feet Tuesday, March 22. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by 1200 PM EDT Sunday.
